sen.j: 三浦 堅太郎（みうら けんたろう、生没年不詳）は、日本の新選組の前身、壬生浪士組の隊士である。
sen.e: Kentaro MIURA (years of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Miburoshigumi (Mibu masterless warriors group) which was the forerunner of the Shinsengumi (literally, the newly selected corps, referring to a special police force for the Tokugawa regime) of Japan.
